>Dark Star-like Syndra skin, thanks.

She already got one: it's called "base skin". ;)

Yes, but it _[could be so much more](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/0/0f/Syndra.move6.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121119071138)_. ;)

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/55/Syndra_Initial_Concept.jpg
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c6/Syndra_early_design_variations.jpg

Ya know, that girl with supposedely an infinite potential to control the magic surrounding her at will growing every day.

Why shouldn't she get a "level up" skin?

Take Viktor for example.
He has a Prototype skin, which is his less augumented young self and there he has a Creator skin showing him at his prime.

Honestly, there is only one Syndra skin I'd like to see now:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/fancreations/a9WhXMWT-skin-concept-poro-syndra

But after that, and an ultimate skin for my Lulu, I'm all for more Syndra skins. :D

>Take Viktor for example.
He has a Prototype skin, which is his less augumented young self and there he has a Creator skin showing him at his prime.

Oh, so that's why I like my Creator Viktor so much, whereas Prototype...not so much. ^^

>I got the high-res images sent directly from the creator.

http://i.imgur.com/RGQgYWX.jpg?B

I KNEW that would happen! You...you just _had_ to do that to me!? You KNEW I would say I didn't know where they were, didn't you?

I didn't want to ruin the print, so I put it in a safe place...yeah, so safe, I can't find it again.
And the digital DLs seemingly are on the backup drive...

But guess what? I DLed the original again! Hah! take _that_!
_Oh, you mah bitch now, #Kappa..._

You ofc. only gets a reduced version because you questioned me!

See that "s" in _Poros_ now? That was my contribution.

I never lie, sir.

That is all I have. Not that I know what you want with it. Any and all props goes to [the creator ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/EUNE/Kobila2000)anyway.

http://forums.eune.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=677060

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ncQIg6GJ,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-09T19:18:57.755+0000)
>
> Oh...yeah, I thought there was something familiar about your nick. I just couldn't place it.
> Then you have my sympathy! Got some BS "mature content" warnings myself.
> _Damn oversensitive moderators..._

They say it's excessive as in "way too often", but in truth they are full of it.
4 months ago I got a one week ban for posting "mature" content and was said that this is my final warning.
In the following 3 months I had 2 posts removed for posting "mature" content without any kind of other punishment, then another week long ban for posting the Thresh "wifestealer" meme and 5 days after it ended got a perm for a Spiderman meme in a Spiderman thread.

A long time ago when I was frequenting a certain The Elder Scrolls forum they had:

1. Visible moderation consisting of:
a. visible warning counter - no fucking questions asked
b. comments not being completely deleted, unless it was a multi-post, which were either removed to combined, depending on the content. You could also say sorry in the doubled post and ask for a removal there; nobody would make a problem
c. threads posted in wrong sections were moved to the correct one in most cases
d. comments with "bad" content were in most cases censored and a colored comment was added by a moderator
2. Strict set of rules. For example "No swearing" meant "No swearing". Period.
3. Moderation which followed those rules, instead of issuing punishment based on their personal butthurt.
4. Moderator whose behavior didn't follow #3 were warned themselves and on repeated offense removed.

Nobody ever had any problems with it.

League of Legends has none of that.

Bringing any issues with moderation to the Riot Support only shows that they can't deal with it either due to lack of power or knowledge, so bothering with them is a complete waste of time.

> Want me to share my Syndra folders too? _Why am I having a deja vu there as well..._
> Or better yet: share yours too!
> _Onedrive, Google Drive, Dropbox...surely you have either._

I never really used any of those things, so I dunno.

> Then there is when you say "thank you". But I accept skins as well. ;)
> _One just gotta try, right?_

Do or do not. There is no try.
Well, even if I wanted to, I made myself a policy to not buy any more RP, so unless Rito will make a way to give skins bought with IP, it's a no-go.

Let me know when it's DLed.
